headline: Read, watch President Trump’s full speech after US, Israel strikes in Iran, urging Iranians to ‘take over your government’

Trump ends government use of Anthropic’s AI models, Bill Clinton says he knew nothing about Epstein’s crimes and the HBO investment-bank show “Industry” branches out. Read more in today’s What’s News newsletter:

Saudi Arabia condemns Iran’s attacks on Gulf nations, offers ‘all its capabilities’ in the fight against Tehran
Bill Clinton said he had no idea of the crimes that Jeffrey Epstein was committing, during an extraordinary deposition of the former Democratic president before a GOP-led House committee
The Pentagon said it shot down a “seemingly threatening” drone near the U.S.-Mexico border Thursday, prompting aviation officials to expand flight restrictions around an area of Fort Hancock, Texas
Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, Iran’s supreme leader, and “other senior Iranian officials were targets” in Saturday’s strikes...
